1249.question: How much important is the visual grounding in the learning of the multilingual representations?
1249.response: {'Answer': 'The results show that the visual grounding is crucial for the learning of the multilingual representations. When the visual grounding is removed, the performance of the model drops significantly. This indicates that the visual grounding helps the model to learn more discriminative and generalizable representations.'}
1249.answer: performance is significantly degraded without pixel data
